title: Apply uploaded PATIL Construction logo across header and footer

requirements.summary: Generate a clean transparent logo asset from the uploaded screenshot and ensure SiteHeader/SiteFooter render it via the existing LogoMark component.
acceptanceCriteria: A generated static image exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/patil-logo.dim_512x512.png.
The SiteHeader and SiteFooter logo renders using the updated asset without any broken image links.
The logo remains legible/clear on both light and dark backgrounds (no unintended cropping or excessive empty padding around the mark).

file_operations.description: Create/replace the generated logo by extracting/cropping the PATIL CONSTRUCTION mark from Screenshot_20260214-164840-1.png and exporting as a 512x512 PNG with transparent background and tight, balanced padding (final file must be exactly frontend/public/assets/generated/patil-logo.dim_512x512.png).

Confirm LogoMark points to /assets/generated/patil-logo.dim_512x512.png and, if needed, adjust only LogoMark presentation (e.g., container sizing/padding/contrast-safe styling) to keep the mark legible on both light and dark backgrounds without cropping.
